(2,): As a user, I want to create a user story, so that I can keep track of important tasks and requirements As a user, I want to update a user story's description, so that I can reflect changes in requirements or tasks As a user, I want to add a user story to my account, so that I can manage my tasks in one place As a user, I want to retrieve all my user stories, so that I can review my tasks and their statuses
(0,): As a data user, I want to access data, so that I can analyze it for insights As a FABS user, I want to submit a FABS submission, so that it can be processed and published As a user, I want to validate a submission, so that I can confirm it is ready for publication As a user, I want to publish a submission, so that it becomes available for review or processing
(1,): As a developer, I want to cache generation requests, so that I can optimize performance and reduce load times As a UI/UX designer, I want to track issues, so that I can ensure a smooth user experience and resolve problems effectively As a broker user, I want to upload and validate a submission, so that I can ensure the submission meets all requirements before publishing
